clinical_study.brief_title: Italian Multicenter Retrospective Observational Study on Transformed Lymphomas
clinical_study.official_title: Italian Multicenter Retrospective Observational Study on Transformed Lymphomas

lead_sponsor.agency: Azienda Ospedaliera Città della Salute e della Scienza di Torino

clinical_study.source: Azienda Ospedaliera Città della Salute e della Scienza di Torino

brief_summary.textblock: Study purpose is to evaluate treatment outcome and survival in patient with aggressive lymphomas transformed from Follicular Lymphoma.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From first response to last follow-up for at least 2 years (up to 15 years)
primary_outcome.description: Time from last response to nearest relapse or follow-up

primary_outcome.time_frame: Date of last follow-up for at least 2 years (up to 15 years)
primary_outcome.description: Time to last follow-up or death

study_pop.textblock: Adult patient with histologically confirmed diagnosis of Transformed Follicular Lymphoma

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Histologically confirmed transformed Follicular Lymphoma
- Age > 18 years
- Histological transformation between January 2002 and December 2014
- Availability of data about treatment and outcome
Exclusion Criteria:
- Other lymphoma diagnosis
